desc: Parkminster create beautifully scented, high quality Candles, Reed Diffusers & Bath products for the home. We blend & pour our products by hand, in our Cornwall & Sussex workshops, using the finest natural ingredients. Vegan, Not Tested on Animals, we're 95% Plastic Free & our packaging is Recycled & Recyclable.

layout.text:
WE MAKE OUR SCENTED CANDLES, REED DIFFUSERS
& BATH PRODUCTS IN-HOUSE - UNLIKE MANY BRANDS
ALWAYS HAND BLENDED & HAND POURED
